description: '''Tchê music''' or '''chê music''' is a variation of the traditional music style from the most southern state of [[Brazil]], [[Rio Grande do Sul]]. It incorporates elements from Bahian music (north-east), of the [[Chorinho]] (ancient Brazilian style), the [[Pagode]] (a variation of [[Samba]]), the Samba itself is also used, folk and dance music, to the most common musical rhythms of Rio Grande do Sul, like the [[Chamamé]], [[Vaneira]] and [[Xote]].
